system.description: When you speak before a crowd, roll +Grace.

failure.label: Complications...
failure.value:
They give you the paparazzi treatment. You can spend 1-Fandom to make them do one of the following:

  • Bring someone forward and deliver them to you.
  • Unite and fight for you.
  • Fall into a frenzy of emotion - joy, sorrow, or rage, your choice.
  • Go quietly back to their lives.

partial.label: Partial success.
partial.value:
You gain 3 Fandom.

They give you the paparazzi treatment. You can spend 1-Fandom to make them do one of the following:

  • Bring someone forward and deliver them to you.
  • Unite and fight for you.
  • Fall into a frenzy of emotion - joy, sorrow, or rage, your choice.
  • Go quietly back to their lives.

success.label: Success!
success.value: You gain 3 Fandom.
